title: Bug 23787 - [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787 - [Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. The page appears distorted on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog, text fields are used instead of labels.
EB: On the Project Properties Info page in the Properties dialog, labels should be used instead of text fields. This will prevent the distortion of the page.
SR: Replace the text fields on the Project Properties Info page with labels to resolve the distortion issue on motif platforms.
